FlexiPage.description: Opportunity Outcome record page to be assigned to IPU Project

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Hello. I am a ✨placeholder component ✨. My sole purpose is to prevent Salesforce from automatically removing this tab. An empty tab is a pointless tab and Salesforce automatically removes these tabs into oblivion. You can safely remove me if you are ready to replace me with the required components for this tab. If not, please do not remove me as it may lead to this tab being removed once you hit Save.
